when I receive "foto kristina"

when green flag clicked

when green flag clicked
    set "building" to 1
    switch to costume "building"

when I receive "goright"
    if <"building" = 1>
        change "building" by 1
        switch to background "building"
        wait 1 secs
    else
        if <"building" = 2>
            change "building" by -1
            switch to background "building"
            wait 1 secs

when I receive "goleft"
    if <"building" = 2>
        change "building" by 1
        switch to background "building"
        wait 1 secs
    else
        if <"building" = 3>
            change "building" by -1
            switch to background "building"
            wait 1 secs

when I receive "dead"
    hide

when green flag clicked
    hide
    forever
        turn 15 degrees
        wait 0.1 secs
        if <touching s[4, "student"]?>
            repeat 10
                change "pixelate" effect by 30
                wait 0.05 secs
            hide
            clear graphic effects

when green flag clicked
    forever
        wait (pick random 2 to 4) secs
        if <(pick random 1 to 0) = 0>

            hide
            say "Hello!"
        else
            go to x: 300 y: -49
            show
            glide 4 secs to x: -300 y: -49
            hide

stack_human_readable:
when I receive "dead"
    switch to costume "dead"
    stop all

when I receive "goleft"
    set "direction" to 1
    go to x: -160 y: -108

when green flag clicked
    set "lives" to 2
    forever
        if <<"building" = 3> and <touching s[6, "sandwich"]?>>
            if <"chomps" = 2>
                broadcast "finished" and wait
            else
                change "chomps" by 1
                say "Delicious" for 0.5 secs
        if <touching s[1, "laptop"]?>
            change "lives" by -1
            if <"lives" = 0>
                say "Dang!"
                switch to costume "dead"
                set y to -165
                broadcast "dead"
                stop script
            repeat 4
                change "brightness" effect by 25
                wait 0.25 secs
            clear graphic effects

when green flag clicked
    say "I'm hungry! " for 1.5 secs
    say "Take me to the Stata Center for lunch." for 1.5 secs
    say "Use the arrow keys." for 1.5 secs

when green flag clicked
    go to x: -190 y: -108
    point in direction -90
    set size to 40 %
    switch to costume "detenidod"
    set "espera" to 0.025
    set "chomps" to 0
    forever
        if <key "down arrow" pressed?>
            if <"direction" = 0>
                switch to costume "agachadoi"
            else
                switch to costume "agachadod"
        else
            if <key "up arrow" pressed?>
                change y by 30
                if <"direction" = 0>
                    switch to costume "saltoi"
                else
                    switch to costume "saltod"
                wait "espera" secs
                change y by -30
            else
                if <key "right arrow" pressed?>
                    set "direction" to 1
                    move -10 steps
                    switch to costume "paso1d"
                    wait "espera" secs
                    switch to costume "paso2d"
                    wait "espera" secs
                    switch to costume "paso3d"
                    wait "espera" secs
                else
                    if <key "left arrow" pressed?>
                        set "direction" to 0
                        move 10 steps
                        switch to costume "paso1i"
                        wait "espera" secs
                        switch to costume "paso2i"
                        wait "espera" secs
                        switch to costume "paso3i"
                        wait "espera" secs
                    else
                        if <"direction" = 0>
                            switch to costume "detenidodi"
                        else
                            switch to costume "detenidod"

when I receive "goright"
    go to x: 160 y: -108
    switch to costume "detenidoi"
    set "direction" to 0

go back 1 layers

when I receive "put clues together"
    play sound "recording3"

when I receive "back to clues"
    set "dance" to 0

when I receive "clue 3 activated"
    set "dance" to 1

when "down arrow" key pressed
    if <"dance" = 0>
        change y by -10
    else
        play drum 39 for 0.25 beats
        change y by -10
        repeat 10
            change "fisheye" effect by -5
        repeat 10
            change "fisheye" effect by 5

when "left arrow" key pressed
    if <"dance" = 0>
        change x by -10
        point in direction -90
    else
        play drum 35 for 0.25 beats
        change x by -10
        point in direction -90
        repeat 10
            change "whirl" effect by -5
        repeat 10
            change "whirl" effect by 5

when "right arrow" key pressed
    if <"dance" = 0>
        change x by 10
        point in direction 90
    else
        play drum 35 for 0.25 beats
        change x by 10
        point in direction 90
        repeat 10
            change "whirl" effect by 5
        repeat 10
            change "whirl" effect by -5

when "up arrow" key pressed
    if <"dance" = 0>
        change y by 10
    else
        play drum 39 for 0.25 beats
        change y by 10
        repeat 10
            change "fisheye" effect by 5
        repeat 10
            change "fisheye" effect by -5

when "t" key pressed
    repeat 36
        turn 10 degrees

when "f" key pressed
    change size by 10

when "f" key pressed
    repeat 3
        change "fisheye" effect by -10
    repeat 3
        change "fisheye" effect by 10

when "r" key pressed
    change x by 10

when "r" key pressed
    repeat 10
        change "whirl" effect by 10
    repeat 10
        change "whirl" effect by -10

when I receive "back to clues"
    set size to 60 %
    go to x: 0 y: 30
    repeat 10
        turn 180 degrees
        change size by -5
        wait 0.05 secs
    repeat 10

stack_human_readable:
when green flag clicked
    set pen size to 1
    set pen color to c[d6d6d6]
    clear

when green flag clicked
    set "bell tone" to 1
    set instrument to 15
    forever
        if <touching color c[cc99ff]?>
            broadcast "next level"
            pen up
            go to x: 187 y: -146
            pen down
            play note 60 for 0.5 beats
            change "bell tone" by 1

when green flag clicked
    forever
        if <key "up arrow" pressed?>
            if <"direction" = 0>
                switch to costume "Right Fire"
            else
                switch to costume "Left Fire"
        else
            if <"direction" = 0>
                switch to costume "Right"
            else
                switch to costume "Left"

when green flag clicked
    set "bell tone" to 0
    set "max fuel" to 100
    go to x: 165 y: -41
    set size to 35 %
    forever
        set "x speed" to ("x speed" - ("x speed" / 10))
        change x by "x speed"

when green flag clicked
    forever
        if <key "up arrow" pressed?>
            pen down
            play sound "fire4"
            if <"jetfuel" > 0>
                change "jetfuel" by -3
            if <"jetfuel" > 10>
                change "y speed" by 0.2
            else
                change "y speed" by -0.2
        else
            pen up
            if <touching color c[00ffff]?>
                if <not <key "down arrow" pressed?>>
                    set "y speed" to 0
                    change y by 2
            else
                change "y speed" by -0.2
            if <100 > "jetfuel">
                change "jetfuel" by 3
        change y by "y speed"

when green flag clicked
    forever
        if <key "right arrow" pressed?>
            set "x speed" to ("x speed" + 0.5)
            set "direction" to 0

when green flag clicked
    forever
        if <key "left arrow" pressed?>
            set "x speed" to ("x speed" + -0.5)
            set "direction" to 1

repeat ((0.5 + "bell tone") / 5)

60 + (\\)

when green flag clicked
    switch to costume "yellow"
    broadcast "introducing"
    play sound "eye of the tiger" until done

    repeat 20
        change "color" effect by 25

when I receive "say "double time""
    repeat 2
        switch to costume "just head"
        wait 0.1 secs
        switch to costume "open mouth"
        wait 0.1 secs
    switch to costume "just head"

when I receive "say "are you ready for the last move""
    repeat 8
        switch to costume "just head"
        wait 0.1 secs
        switch to costume "open mouth"
        wait 0.1 secs
    switch to costume "just head"

when I receive "say "i cant hear you""
    repeat 4
        switch to costume "just head"
        wait 0.3 secs
        switch to costume "open mouth"
        wait 0.3 secs
    switch to costume "just head"

when I receive "say "are you pumped""
    repeat 3
        switch to costume "just head"
        wait 0.1 secs
        switch to costume "open mouth"
        wait 0.1 secs
    switch to costume "just head"

when I receive "stage colors"
    go to x: -184 y: -163
    show
    switch to costume "head + neck"

when I receive "start exercise"
    switch to costume "just head"
    point in direction 90
    go to x: -2 y: 26
    show
    go to front
    set "speed" to 0.7
    wait 0.5 secs
    broadcast "count"
    repeat 4
        turn 65 degrees
        wait "speed" secs
        turn 65 degrees
        wait "speed" secs
        turn 65 degrees
        wait "speed" secs
        turn 65 degrees
        wait "speed" secs
    broadcast "arms"

when green flag clicked
    point in direction 90
    hide

when I receive "head spin"
    wait 1 secs
    repeat 160
        turn 15 degrees
    point in direction 90
    broadcast "go scratch!"

when I receive "go scratch!"
    hide

when green flag clicked
    set "ghost" effect to 100

when green flag clicked
    hide

when I receive "scratch-erobics"
    point in direction 90
    go to x: 3 y: -2
    set size to 1 %
    show
    repeat 10
        change size by 20
        change "color" effect by 25
    wait 1 secs
    repeat 2
        repeat 10
            change size by -1
        repeat 10
            change size by 1
    wait 1 secs
    repeat 50
        turn 15 degrees
        change "color" effect by 25
    broadcast "stage colors"

when I receive "stage colors"
    hide

when I receive "go scratch!"
    show
    set size to 75 %
    go to x: 2 y: 15
    point in direction (pick random 0 to 360)
    forever
        if on edge, bounce
        move 1 steps

when green flag clicked
    hide

when I receive "double time"
    broadcast "say "double time""
    say "Double Time!" for 2 secs
    set "speed" to ("speed" / 2)
    broadcast "wiggle-2x" and wait
    repeat 3
        broadcast "say "double time""
        say "Double Time!" for 0.5 secs
        set "speed" to ("speed" / 2)
        broadcast "wiggle-2x" and wait
    broadcast "last move"

when I receive "are you pumped?"
    broadcast "say "are you pumped""
    say "Are you pumped?!" for 4 secs
    broadcast "say "i cant hear you""
    say "I CAN'T HEAR YOU!!!!" for 6 secs
    broadcast "legs"

when green flag clicked
    go to x: 50 y: 50
    show
    set "ghost" effect to 100

when I receive "last move"
    wait 2 secs
    broadcast "say "are you ready for the last move""
    say "Are you ready for the last move?" for 4 secs
    broadcast "say "i cant hear you""
    say "I CAN'T HEAR YOU!!!" for 4 secs
    broadcast "head spin"

when I receive "go scratch!"
    wait 25 secs
    go to x: -204 y: 193
    show
    forever
        go to x: -204 y: 193
        show
        wait 0.5 secs
        glide 1 secs to x: -185 y: 187

when I receive "legs"
    wait 1 secs
    broadcast "count"
    repeat 4
        switch to costume "right leg"
        wait "speed" secs
        switch to costume "arms out"
        wait "speed" secs
        switch to costume "left leg"
        wait "speed" secs
        switch to costume "arms out"
        wait "speed" secs
    broadcast "wiggle"

when I receive "both arms"
    broadcast "count"
    repeat 8
        switch to costume "arms up"
        wait "speed" secs
        switch to costume "arms out"
        wait "speed" secs
    broadcast "are you pumped?"

when I receive "arms"
    broadcast "count"
    repeat 4
        switch to costume "right up"
        wait "speed" secs
        switch to costume "arms out"
        wait "speed" secs
        switch to costume "left up"
        wait "speed" secs
        switch to costume "arms out"
        wait "speed" secs
    broadcast "both arms"

when I receive "start exercise"

    point in direction 90
    go to x: 2 y: -2
    show

when green flag clicked
    hide

when I receive "wiggle"

    broadcast "double time"

change x by -160

when I receive "calculate one round of life"
    go to x: -70 y: 70
    repeat 8
        repeat 8
            broadcast "apply life" and wait
            change x by 20
        change y by -20
        change x by -160
    broadcast "copy small to big"

when "space" key pressed
    switch to costume "white1"
    stamp
    switch to costume "green2"

when "c" key pressed
    switch to costume "black1"
    clear
    go to x: -70 y: 70
    repeat 8
        repeat 8
            stamp
            change x by 20
        change y by -20
        change x by -160
    switch to costume "green2"
    set "ghost" effect to 20

when "up arrow" key pressed
    point in direction 0
    move 20 steps
    point in direction 90

when I receive "apply life"
    set "num neighbors" to 0
    repeat 8
        turn 45 degrees
    switch to costume "neighborhood2"
    wait 0.5 secs
    switch to costume "green2"
    change x by -20
    change y by 20
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by 20
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by 20
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by -40
    change y by -20
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by 40
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by -40
    change y by -20
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by 20
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by 20
    broadcast "touching?" and wait
    change x by -20
    change y by 20
    if <touching color c[ffffff]?>
        if <"num neighbors" < 2>
            play drum 48 for 0.1 beats
            say "killed"
            switch to costume "yellow1"
            repeat 8
                turn 45 degrees
            repeat 10
                wait 0.05 secs
                hide
                wait 0.05 secs
                show
                set "y" to (y position)
                set "x" to (x position)
            broadcast "update record white" and wait
            switch to costume "green2"
            say ""
            stop script
        if <"num neighbors" > 3>
            play drum 48 for 0.1 beats
            say "killed"
            switch to costume "yellow1"
            repeat 8
                turn 45 degrees
            repeat 10
                wait 0.05 secs
                hide
                wait 0.05 secs
                show
                set "y" to (y position)
                set "x" to (x position)
            broadcast "update record white" and wait
            switch to costume "green2"
            say ""
            stop script
    if <touching color c[000000]?>
        if <"num neighbors" = 3>
            switch to costume "blue1"
            set "y" to (y position)
            set "x" to (x position)
            broadcast "update record" and wait
            play sound "pop"
            repeat 8
                turn 45 degrees
            say "Alive"
            repeat 20
                wait 0.025 secs
                hide
                wait 0.025 secs
                show
            say ""
            switch to costume "green2"

switch to costume "green2"

when I receive "touching red?"
    if <<(y position) > -85> and <<(y position) < 85> and <(x position) < 0>>>
        change x by 160
        broadcast "black neighbor?" and wait
        change x by -160
        stop script
    if <<(y position) > -85> and <<(y position) < 85> and <0 < (x position)>>>
        change x by -160
        broadcast "black neighbor?" and wait
        change x by 160
        stop script
    if <<(x position) > -85> and <<(x position) < 85> and <0 < (y position)>>>
        change y by -160
        broadcast "black neighbor?" and wait
        change y by 160
        stop script
    if <<(x position) > -85> and <<(x position) < 85> and <(y position) < 0>>>
        change y by 160
        broadcast "black neighbor?" and wait
        change y by -160
        stop script
    if <<(x position) > 85> and <85 < (y position)>>
        change x by -160
        change y by -160
        broadcast "black neighbor?" and wait
        change y by 160
        change x by 160
        stop script
    if <<-85 > (x position)> and <85 < (y position)>>
        change x by 160

when I receive "createClones"

            duplicateNoAttach

when I receive "run"
    if <"is clone?" = "false">
        forever
            if <<"is clone?" = "false"> and <touching "mouse"?>>
                change "clones" by -1
                deleteClone
            point towards "mouse"
            move 10 steps

when green flag clicked
    hide
    go to x: 0 y: -100
    forever
        repeat 10
        if <"is clone?" = "true">
            set "is clone?" to "false"
            show
            createClone
            change "clones" by 1
            hide
            set "is clone?" to "true"
            broadcast "run"

when I receive "move!"
    if <"moved" = "0">
        move 4 steps
        set "moved" to "1"

when I receive "cloneit"
    if <"cloned" = "0">
        set "moved" to "0"
        createClone
        set "cloned" to "1"
        set "moved" to "1"
        broadcast "move!"
